MAIN.OBJECTIVE: CREATING THE NEXT GENERATION OF NETWORKS.
MAIN.ABOUT_US: WFI is a leading company in providing consulting, engineering and installation services in telecommunications systems, fixed and wireless networks, security systems, data centers and structured cabling, as well as maintenance and administration of wireless networks
MAIN.MISSION: Provide professional engineering and deployment services to telecommunications companies to improve the connectivity of society and generate sources of employment.
MAIN.VISION: To be a company that in the next 5 years is diversified and a benchmark in the Information and Communications Technology market, capable of providing high-value services that increase its profitability.

TEXT.1: El diseño de productos tecnológicos (artefactos, procesos, sistemas e infraestructura) está en el centro de la naturaleza de la ingeniería. El diseño en ingeniería es un proceso sistemático, creativo y flexible, sustentado en las matemáticas, las ciencias naturales y las ciencias de la ingeniería, que incluye la generación, la evaluación sistemática y la puesta a prueba de especificaciones para la creación de artefactos, sistemas, procesos e infraestructura cuya forma y función permitan lograr unos objetivos establecidos y satisfacer una serie de restricciones especificadas a partir de una necesidad o situación problemática

DESIGN.1: The design of technological products (devices, processes, systems and infrastructure) is at the core of the nature of engineering. Engineering design is a systematic, creative and flexible process, based on mathematics, science natural and engineering sciences, including the generation, systematic evaluation, and testing of specifications for the creation of artifacts, systems, processes, and infrastructure whose form and function achieve stated goals and satisfy specified constraints from a need or problematic situation

1.TITLE: Electric Power, Veracruz
1.TEXT_1: In 2019, in the expansion of the New Port of Veracruz, Mexico. Our client, the company CCCC, had to deliver the implementation of the medium and low voltage electrical project within the Port facilities, in some areas to fulfill an assigned contract, He did not have any Business Partner in Mexico, that is how he approached WFI de MEXICO to ask for support due to the experience and quality services that our company offers to all its clients, we made the term a reality in due time and form for this ambitious project.
1.TEXT_2: WFI carried out works for the new Icave Container Terminal in the port of Veracruz, the works consisted of the electrical area of ​​transformers, boards, lighting, contacts, and ground system and 19 Racks that feed Refrigerated containers ( 24 containers per Rack), the work on the racks consisted of the installation of boards, marine ladder, special wiring, metal equipment bases and placement of container sockets
1.TEXT_3: With a global amount of $30 million pesos divided into: Supply of + 1000 lamps with very detailed specifications in support of Salinity, Gland Price and time, Physical Earth Systems and others Lighting of + 13,000 m2 for buildings such as CFS , SADER, OCR TRAIN, WCW and other spaces
